00014 #include "pulserdriverconnector.h"

00021 XQPulserDriverConnector::XQPulserDriverConnector(
00022     const shared_ptr<XPulser> &node, Q3Table *item, XQGraph *qgraph)
00023     : XQConnector(node, item),
00024       m_pTable(item),
00025       m_pulser(node),
00026       m_graph(createOrphan<XGraph>(node->getName().c_str(), false))
00027 {
00028     shared_ptr<XPulser> pulser(node);    
00029     m_lsnOnPulseChanged = pulser->onRecord().connectWeak(
00030         shared_from_this(), &XQPulserDriverConnector::onPulseChanged,
00031         XListener::FLAG_MAIN_THREAD_CALL | XListener::FLAG_AVOID_DUP | XListener::FLAG_DELAY_ADAPTIVE);
00032   
00033     m_pTable->setNumCols(3);
00034     double def = 50;
00035     m_pTable->setColumnWidth(0, (int)(def * 1.5));
00036     m_pTable->setColumnWidth(1, (int)(def * 1.5));
00037     m_pTable->setColumnWidth(2, (int)(def * 3.0));
00038     QStringList labels;
00039     labels += "Time [ms]";
00040     labels += "Diff [ms]";
00041     labels += "Pattern (Port 0, 1, ...)";
00042     m_pTable->setColumnLabels(labels);
00043     m_pTable->setReadOnly(true);
00044     m_pTable->setSelectionMode(Q3Table::MultiRow);
00045 
00046     Q3Header *header = m_pTable->verticalHeader();
00047     header->setResizeEnabled(false);
00048       
00049     connect(m_pTable, SIGNAL( selectionChanged()), this, SLOT(selectionChanged()) );
00050     connect(m_pTable, SIGNAL( clicked( int, int, int, const QPoint& )), this,
00051             SLOT( clicked( int, int, int, const QPoint& )));
00052 
00053     qgraph->setGraph(m_graph);
00054     
00055     atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> axes_list(m_graph->axes()->children());
00056     shared_ptr<XAxis> axisx = dynamic_pointer_cast<XAxis>(axes_list->at(0));
00057     shared_ptr<XAxis> axisy = dynamic_pointer_cast<XAxis>(axes_list->at(1));
00058 
00059     axisy->ticLabelFormat()->value("%.0f");
00060     
00061     m_graph->backGround()->value(QColor(0x0A, 0x05, 0x45).rgb());
00062     m_graph->titleColor()->value(clWhite);
00063     m_graph->drawLegends()->value(false);
00064     axisx->label()->value("Time [ms]");
00065     axisx->ticColor()->value(clWhite);
00066     axisx->labelColor()->value(clWhite);
00067     axisx->ticLabelColor()->value(clWhite);  
00068     axisy->label()->value("Port");
00069     axisy->majorTicScale()->value(1);
00070     axisy->autoFreq()->value(false);  
00071     axisy->displayMinorTics()->value(false);  
00072     axisy->ticColor()->value(clWhite);
00073     axisy->labelColor()->value(clWhite);
00074     axisy->ticLabelColor()->value(clWhite);
00075     for(int i=0; i < XPulser::NUM_DO_PORTS; i++)
00076     {
00077         shared_ptr<XXYPlot> plot = m_graph->plots()->create<XXYPlot>(
00078             formatString("Port%d", i).c_str(), true, m_graph);
00079         plot->label()->value(i18n("Port%1").arg(i));
00080         plot->axisX()->value(axisx);
00081         plot->axisY()->value(axisy);
00082         m_plots.push_back(plot);
00083         plot->drawPoints()->value(false);
00084         plot->displayMajorGrid()->value(false);
00085         plot->lineColor()->value(QColor(0x4e, 0xff, 0x10).rgb());
00086         plot->clearPoints()->setUIEnabled(false);
00087         plot->maxCount()->setUIEnabled(false);
00088     }
00089     m_barPlot = m_graph->plots()->create<XXYPlot>("Bars", true, m_graph);
00090     m_barPlot->label()->value(i18n("Bars"));
00091     m_barPlot->axisX()->value(axisx);
00092     m_barPlot->axisY()->value(axisy);
00093     m_barPlot->drawBars()->value(true);
00094     m_barPlot->drawLines()->value(false);
00095     m_barPlot->drawPoints()->value(false);
00096     m_barPlot->barColor()->value(QColor(0x4A, 0x3D, 0x87).rgb());
00097     m_barPlot->displayMajorGrid()->value(true);
00098     m_barPlot->majorGridColor()->value(QColor(0x4A, 0x4A, 0).rgb());
00099     m_barPlot->drawLines()->setUIEnabled(false);
00100     m_barPlot->drawPoints()->setUIEnabled(false);
00101     m_barPlot->lineColor()->setUIEnabled(false);
00102     m_barPlot->pointColor()->setUIEnabled(false);
00103     m_barPlot->clearPoints()->setUIEnabled(false);
00104     m_barPlot->maxCount()->setUIEnabled(false);
00105 
00106     m_graph->label()->value(i18n("Pulse Patterns"));
00107 }

00111 }

00113 void
00114 XQPulserDriverConnector::clicked( int , int , int, const QPoint & )

00118 void
00119 XQPulserDriverConnector::selectionChanged()
00120 {
00121     shared_ptr<XPulser> pulser(m_pulser);
00122     pulser->readLockRecord();    
00123     updateGraph(true);
00124     pulser->readUnlockRecord();
00125 }
00126 void
00127 XQPulserDriverConnector::updateGraph(bool checkselection)
00128 {
00129     shared_ptr<XPulser> pulser(m_pulser);
00130     XScopedLock<XGraph> lock(*m_graph);
00131     
00132     std::deque<XGraph::ValPoint> & barplot_points(m_barPlot->points());
00133     m_barPlot->maxCount()->value(pulser->m_relPatList.size());
00134     barplot_points.clear();
00135     std::deque<std::deque<XGraph::ValPoint> *> plots_points;
00136     for(std::deque<shared_ptr<XXYPlot> >::iterator it = m_plots.begin();
00137         it != m_plots.end(); it++)
00138     {
00139         (*it)->maxCount()->value(pulser->m_relPatList.size() * 2);
00140         (*it)->points().clear();
00141         plots_points.push_back(&(*it)->points());
00142     }
00143     uint32_t lastpat = pulser->m_relPatList.empty() ? 0 :
00144         pulser->m_relPatList[pulser->m_relPatList.size() - 1].pattern;
00145     double firsttime = -0.001, lasttime = 100;
00146     
00147     int i = 0;
00148     for(XPulser::RelPatListIterator it = pulser->m_relPatList.begin(); 
00149         it != pulser->m_relPatList.end(); it++)
00150     {
00151         double time = it->time * pulser->resolution();
00152         if(m_pTable->isRowSelected(i))
00153         {
00154             if(firsttime < 0) firsttime = time;
00155             lasttime = time;
00156         }
00157         barplot_points.push_back(XGraph::ValPoint(time, m_plots.size()));
00158         for(int j = 0; j < (int)plots_points.size(); j++)
00159         {
00160             plots_points[j]->push_back(XGraph::ValPoint(time, j + 0.7 * ((lastpat >> j) % 2)));
00161             plots_points[j]->push_back(XGraph::ValPoint(time, j + 0.7 * ((it->pattern >> j) % 2)));
00162         }
00163         lastpat = it->pattern;
00164         i++;
00165     }
00166     if(checkselection)
00167     {
00168         if(lasttime == firsttime) {
00169             firsttime -= 0.5;
00170             lasttime += 0.5;
00171         }
00172         double width = lasttime - firsttime;
00173         firsttime -= width / 10;
00174         lasttime += width / 10;
00175         shared_ptr<XAxis> axisx = *m_barPlot->axisX();
00176         axisx->autoScale()->value(false);
00177         axisx->minValue()->value(firsttime);
00178         axisx->maxValue()->value(lasttime);
00179     }        
00180     m_graph->requestUpdate();
00181 }
00182 
00183 void
00184 XQPulserDriverConnector::onPulseChanged(const shared_ptr<XDriver> &)
00185 {
00186     shared_ptr<XPulser> pulser(m_pulser);
00187 
00188     pulser->readLockRecord();
00189     
00190     if(pulser->time()) {
00191         
00192         m_pTable->blockSignals(true);
00193         m_pTable->setNumRows(pulser->m_relPatList.size());
00194         int i = 0;
00195         for(XPulser::RelPatListIterator it = pulser->m_relPatList.begin();
00196             it != pulser->m_relPatList.end(); it++)
00197         {
00198             //        Form->tblPulse->insertRows(i);
00199             m_pTable->setText(i, 0, formatString("%.4f", it->time * pulser->resolution()));
00200             m_pTable->setText(i, 1, formatString("%.4f", it->toappear * pulser->resolution()));
00201             QString s;
00202             uint32_t pat = it->pattern;
00203             for(int j = 0; j < XPulser::NUM_DO_PORTS; j++) {
00204                 //            if(j != 0) s+= ",";
00205                 s += (pat % 2) ? "1" : "0";
00206                 pat /= 2;
00207             }
00208             m_pTable->setText(i, 2, s);
00209             i++;
00210         }
00211         m_pTable->blockSignals(false);
00212         
00213         updateGraph(false);
00214     }
00215     else {
00216         m_pTable->setNumRows(0);
00217         XScopedLock<XGraph> lock(*m_graph);
00218         for(std::deque<shared_ptr<XXYPlot> >::iterator it = m_plots.begin();
00219             it != m_plots.end(); it++) {
00220             (*it)->clearAllPoints();
00221         }
00222         m_barPlot->clearAllPoints();
00223         m_graph->requestUpdate();
00224     }
00225     
00226     pulser->readUnlockRecord();    
00227 }
